Token.Abstract: An NSString class extension that provides various methods for creating and utilizing regular expressions.
Returns an NSRegularExpression instance by treating the receiver as a regular expression pattern string.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The regular expression, or nil if the receiver could not be interpreted as a valid regular expression.

Token.Abstract: Returns an NSRegularExpression instance by treating the receiver as a regular expression pattern string.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: The options that govern the behavior of the returned regular expression.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The regular expression, or nil if the receiver could not be interpreted as a valid regular expression.

Token.Abstract: Returns an NSRegularExpression instance by treating the receiver as a regular expression pattern string.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: The options that govern the behavior of the returned regular expression.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: An optional pointer to storage for an NSError instance. If this parameter is non-nil and an error occurs, *errPtr will be updated to point to an NSError describing the problem.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The regular expression, or nil if the receiver could not be interpreted as a valid regular expression.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new regular expression pattern string by escaping metacharacters contained in the receiver.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The escaped pattern string.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new regular expression template string by escaping metacharacters contained in the receiver.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The escaped template string.

Token.Abstract: Matches the specified regular expression against the receiver.

Parameter.Name: pattern
Parameter.Abstract: The regular expression pattern to match.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array of NSTextCheckingResult objects representing the regular expression pattern matches found within the receiver.

Token.Abstract: Matches the specified regular expression against the receiver.

Parameter.Name: pattern
Parameter.Abstract: The regular expression pattern to match.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: The regular expression options that govern how matching will occur.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array of NSTextCheckingResult objects representing the regular expression pattern matches found within the receiver.

Token.Abstract: Matches the specified regular expression against the receiver.

Parameter.Name: pattern
Parameter.Abstract: The regular expression pattern to match.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: The regular expression options that govern how matching will occur.

Parameter.Name: range
Parameter.Abstract: The range of characters in the receiver within which matching will occur.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array of NSTextCheckingResult objects representing the regular expression pattern matches found within the receiver.

Token.Abstract: Matches the specified regular expression against the receiver.

Parameter.Name: pattern
Parameter.Abstract: The regular expression pattern to match.

Parameter.Name: range

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: An optional pointer to storage for an NSError instance. If this parameter is non-nil and an error occurs, *errPtr will be updated to point to an NSError describing the problem.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array of NSTextCheckingResult objects representing the regular expression pattern matches found within the receiver.

Token.Abstract: Determines if the receiver contains at least one match of the given regular expression pattern.

Parameter.Name: pattern
Parameter.Abstract: The regular expression pattern to match.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the receiver contained at least one match of pattern; NO if there were no matches.

Token.Abstract: Determines if the receiver contains at least one match of the given regular expression pattern.

Parameter.Name: pattern
Parameter.Abstract: The regular expression pattern to match.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: The regular expression options that govern how matching will occur.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the receiver contained at least one match of pattern; NO if there were no matches.

Token.Abstract: Determines if the receiver contains at least one match of the given regular expression pattern within the specified range.

Parameter.Name: pattern
Parameter.Abstract: The regular expression pattern to match.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: The regular expression options that govern how matching will occur.

Parameter.Name: range
Parameter.Abstract: The range of characters in the receiver within which matching will occur.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the receiver contained at least one match of pattern; NO if there were no matches.

Token.Abstract: Determines if the receiver contains at least one match of the given regular expression pattern within the specified range.

Parameter.Abstract: The regular expression pattern to match.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: The regular expression options that govern how matching will occur.

Parameter.Name: range
Parameter.Abstract: The range of characters in the receiver within which matching will occur.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: An optional pointer to storage for an NSError instance. If this parameter is non-nil and an error occurs, *errPtr will be updated to point to an NSError describing the problem.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the receiver contained at least one match of pattern; NO if there were no matches.

Token.Abstract: Returns the number of matches found in the receiver of the given regular expression pattern.

Parameter.Name: pattern
Parameter.Abstract: The regular expression pattern to match.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The number of matches.

Parameter.Name: options

ReturnValue.Abstract: The number of matches.

Token.Abstract: Returns the first occurrence of the specified regular expression pattern found within the receiver.

Parameter.Name: pattern
Parameter.Abstract: The regular expression pattern to match.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSTextCheckingResult instance containing the results of the match.

Token.Abstract: Determines the range of the first match of the given regular expression within the receiver.

Parameter.Name: pattern
Parameter.Abstract: The regular expression pattern to match.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The range of the first match. Will be {NSNotFound, 0} if there is no match.

Token.Abstract: Returns a new string by replacing each match of the specified regular expression pattern with the replacement template provided.

Parameter.Name: pattern
Parameter.Abstract: The regular expression pattern to match.

Parameter.Name: templ
Parameter.Abstract: The template to use for replacing the regular expression matches.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The resulting string.

Token.Abstract: Returns a new string by replacing each match of the specified regular expression pattern with the replacement template provided.

Parameter.Name: templ

Parameter.Name: options

ReturnValue.Abstract: The resulting string.
